amendment.description: To provide that certain provisions in this Act relating to limitations, transparency, and oversight regarding medical research conducted by the Department of Defense shall have no force or effect.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4369 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 32. Record Vote Number: 90.

action.text: Amendment SA 4369 proposed by Senator Durbin.
